It's a good game, if you have friends to play with. If you were going to play solo, I'd refrain from doing so. Preferably a 5 man squad or else you will have toxic and annoying teammates. And if the standard competitive isn't for you, there are lots of other game modes and community servers with custom minigames and such.
Great game!!! Even better with friends
